oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Potential risk factors for piglet mortality in Danish organic pig production
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rangstrup-Christensen, Lena
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
An on-going large scale study in nine medium-large sized Danish organic pig herds during one year from June 2014 until June 2015.
Detailed mortality registrations on 6000 farrowings.
Necropsies of 4000 piglets.
